channel.title: Need A Pro Coder [317]
channel.description:
I need a pro coder that can code the following items - Full Bandos - Dragon Claws + Special + "In-Bag Look" - Full Vesta - Full Statius - Full Dragon - Costoms (Optional) - Shops - Npc Talk, Moves and Hits Hard - Make Rings (Optional) - Make ALL Skills Work (Optional) - Make Great Commands - Make Lots Of Donation Features - Make GodSword's - (i.e Special, Stance) List Of Costoms (If You Can Make - Optional) - New Skill - New Wepons - New Npc's - New Attacks - My Very Own - Master Specail Attack - New Vengeance - Make it say "(ownersign" Hoster {Player Name+ Rights} Has Logged In (owner Sign)" - New Quests
If you Can do all The Costoms You Wil be Rewarded with $500.00 us and 1000 Xats If you can't Do The Costoms Then You Will Get Owner On The server (PRO SERVER :p)
Sign Owner Of New Coming Server XturX Scape

item.title: Need A Pro Coder [317]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Owner of XturX Scape:

What Does that mean

It means stop breaking the rules and if you want to program then stop being lazy and learn how to do it yourself. It’s really not that complex. Basic English and Mathematics skills combined with logic can get you a long way.
